DESCRIPTION: Allows you to remove change from a user.
IS_NAN: Please check the quantity specified. Note that it cannot be negative and must not exceed 10,000.
IS_BOT: Cannot remove currency from a bot.
NEGATIVE: The value you entered was too high for the amount this user has, so their wallet was reset to 0.
TITLE: Removal of change from {{username}}'s wallet.
RESULT: This user had {{startBalance}}€, you have just deleted {{toRemove}}€, he now has {{newBalance}}€ in his wallet.
